Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its value and quality, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while also maximizing my earnings for the product. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
